content.raw:
Works as advertised! Thanks for iterating!

I triggered a new round of CI just to make sure everything is still fine after the latest commits. I'm ok merging if they come back ok.

* Homebrew [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1902/badge/icon)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1902/)
* Windows [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/2725/badge/icon)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/2725/)
* Ubuntu GPU [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia/138/badge/icon)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia/138/)
